abilities.name: Power Chord
abilities.description: Innate - Aura: Sona's basic abilities each generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers her and all allied  champions who enter its radius, also incurring a 0.5 seconds period during which she cannot cast her other basic abilities.
descriptions: Innate - Aura: Sona's basic abilities each generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers her and all allied  champions who enter its radius, also incurring a 0.5 seconds period during which she cannot cast her other basic abilities.

Innate - Power Chord: After casting 3 basic abilities, Sona's next basic attack becomes  unstoppable, deals 20 −  240 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and applies an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.
Power Chord  resets Sona's basic attack timer.

abilities.name: Hymn of Valor
abilities.description: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound that deal magic damage to the two nearest  visible enemies, prioritizing champions.
descriptions: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound that deal magic damage to the two nearest  visible enemies, prioritizing champions.
Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 3 seconds.
Granting an ally (other than herself) the aura refunds 30 mana per cast.
Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals「 40% bonus magic damage. 」「 28 −  336 (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage. 」

abilities.name: Aria of Perseverance
abilities.description: Active: Sona  heals herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.
descriptions: Active: Sona  heals herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.
Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a  shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.
Granting an ally (other than herself) the aura refunds 30 mana per cast.
Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces its target's size by 8% and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Song of Celerity
abilities.description: Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.
abilities.leveling: Aura Bonus Movement Speed:10 / 11 / 12 / 13 / 14% (+ 2% per 100 AP)
levelings: Aura Bonus Movement Speed:10 / 11 / 12 / 13 / 14% (+ 2% per 100 AP)
descriptions: Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.
Aura: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
Granting an ally (other than herself) the aura refunds 30 mana per cast.
Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord  slows its target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.

abilities.name: Crescendo
abilities.description: Passive: Reduces the base  cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
descriptions: Passive: Reduces the base  cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
Active: Sona plays an irresistible chord in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemy champions struck and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Sona
title: Maven of the Strings
blurb: Sona is Demacia's foremost virtuoso of the stringed etwahl, speaking only through her graceful chords and vibrant arias. This genteel manner has endeared her to the highborn, though others suspect her spellbinding melodies to actually emanate magic—a...
